participant_1.background:
I visited a small mountain town with my family and enjoyed the beautiful scenery and fresh air.
my sister and i are in a grunge band.
I've started bringing a snack to work so I'm not starving by the time my students arrive.
My favorite people are those who share my love of game shows and fashion.
My first guitar was my favorite thing I ever bought.

i work part time at aldi s.

i make over 200 , 000 per year.
i want to move to london when i get older.

content.text: Hey, I'm excited to meet you! What's your name?
Hi, my name is [name]. Nice to meet you too!
Where are you from?
I'm from the Bay Area, California. How about you?
I'm from the Midwest, but I live in California now.
What do you do for work?
I'm a teacher. What about you?
I'm a part-time cashier at Aldi's. It's not my dream job, but it pays the bills.
What are your hobbies?
I love to write in my journal and I'm a huge fan of game shows. I also play the guitar.
That's awesome! I love game shows too. I play the drums and I'm in a grunge band with my sister.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be in a band.
It's a lot of fun, but it can also be a lot of work.
I'm sure it is. What's your favorite game show?
I love Jeopardy! It's so challenging and I love learning new things.
That's a great show! I love Family Feud.
That's a good one too! I like how the contestants get to interact with each other.
Me too! I'm so glad we met. We have a lot in common.
Me too! I hope we can stay in touch.
Definitely! We should exchange phone numbers or something.
That sounds great
